basics.name: Ujjwal Ojha
basics.summary: I am a Product-Minded Software Engineer who is extremely passionate about providing value while designing systems with long-term vision in mind.

work.summary: Solving challenging problems in courier/shipping industry using technology
highlights: Managed to lead and deliver 3 big releases of a new cutting-edge courier recommendation project in the shipping industry
Designing and architecturing system for complex business requirements
Mentor other engineers and review code of other engineers to ensure software quality
Lead feature implementation in backend using Node and TypeScript and in frontend using React
Improve observability/monitoring capabilities of existing system to eliminate downtime/broken features in production

work.summary: Working as a Software Engineer mostly on Microservices architecture.
highlights: Handle smooth migration of third party system with zero downtime on user base.
Re-engineer PHP/JS microservices to handle more traffic.
Introduce Domain Driven Design and CQRS to architecture a new php based microservice.
Being a part of on-call team roaster responsbile for co-ordinating issues, troubleshooting outages and preparing incident reports for website outages.
Automate end-to-end CI build process and deployment for new services in k8s.

work.summary: Worked on distributed system for Managed security service provider (MSSP).
highlights: Interacted with other team of developers for API compatibility and smoothly develop new features maintaining compatibility.
Engineer an event based system to scale the distributed system of MSSP asynchronously.
Engineer a system for MSSP to be able to handle multiple version of a SIEM system.
Making use of background job scaling tool like RabbitMQ to design certain features.

work.summary: Architectured a distributed web application system(SaaS). Lead a team of developers together to deliver business goals. Practice continuous delivery and Agile to deliver software as quickly as possible to the end user.
highlights: Develop microservices to build scalable SaaS systems.
Formulate a plan to refactor a legacy system using old technologies to new technologies and implemented it in a running system.
Automate microservices deployment.
Create internal systems for smoothening/simplifying internal processes.

work.summary: I worked as a Software Engineer on multiple freelance projects.
highlights: Developing REST APIs and Single Page applications.
Incorporate software best practices to create maintainable systems.
Perform optimizations in backend to reduce application response time and reduce server cost in higher traffic.
Developing Single Page applications

work.summary: I worked mostly on PHP backends and maintained basic production servers.
